newsitem.title: NETHERLANDS: Lanschot sees Hagemeyer as strong outperformer.
newsitem.headline: Lanschot sees Hagemeyer as strong outperformer.

text.p: COMMENT: STRONG OUTPERFORMANCE (maintain). Hagemeyer posted 13.9 percent EPS growth in 1996 to 6.72 guilders. Despite legging building markets in Europe, operating profit of Electronical Distribution rose 8 pct and more improvement seen. results of Consumer & Professional Products impressive with operating profit as pct of sales rising to 6.3 pct (from 5.7). Speciality Foods lagged strongly with op. profit 1.8 pct of sales. New hired management will make turnaround this year.
